USD and yen gaining as reports of Kim Jong Un's 'grave danger' to health spread

Tue 21 Apr 2020 02:45:29 GMT

Author: Eamonn Sheridan Link: /About#team | Category: News Link: //www.forexlive.com

  • share

Earlier post here on KJU North Korean leader Kim Jong Un is receiving treatment after undergoing a cardiovascular procedure Link: https://www.forexlive.com/news/!/north-korean-leader-kim-jong-un-is-receiving-treatment-cardiovascular-procedure-20200421

Then this one:

See here for global coronavirus case data Link: https://datatrackers.io/covid19-coronavirus/en/
These reports are circulating more widely now and the US dollar and yen are seeing inflows while 'risk' is sold off. South Korean markets were the first to be hit, but now its percolating into EUR, GBP and others, all lower agains against the usd. USD/JPY is down a little as flow into yen has ramped up also.
